scripts.supabase:link: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase link
scripts.supabase:list: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase migration list
scripts.supabase:start: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase start
scripts.supabase:stop: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase stop
scripts.supabase:diff: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase db diff --use-migra
scripts.supabase:commit: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase db remote commit
scripts.supabase:push: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase db push
scripts.supabase:reset: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase db reset
scripts.supabase:migration: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase migration new
scripts.supabase:status: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- pnpm dlx supabase status
scripts.prisma:generate: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- prisma generate && bun format
scripts.prisma:migrate: infisical run --projectId=9f73acd5-d571-4b43-9454-4c426d0fb35c --env=dev --path=/app -- prisma migrate dev --name init
